title: Ireland Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Ireland decreased to 308.15 percent in 2021 from 330.78 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Ireland averaged 320.28 percent from 2001 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 429.50 percent in 2016 and a record low of 188.69 percent in 2002. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
